errors.error_description: Running setup.py install after pip install is incorrect order and redundant
correction_candidates: Remove the setup.py install command and use only pip install testfixtures
Run setup.py install first, then pip install testfixtures
Use python -m pip install testfixtures instead of setup.py
Clone the repository first: git clone repo_url && cd testfixtures && python setup.py install
errors.golden_answer: Remove the setup.py install command and use only pip install testfixtures
